itunes:title: Episode 1073 - Bryan Callen
title: Episode 1073 - Bryan Callen
itunes:author: Tetherball Academy Media
itunes:subtitle: Actor and comedian Bryan Callen of 'The Hangover' and 'MADtv' joins the show to talk about creating his own content in standup versus working in Hollywood, and what it was like working with director Todd Phillips -- plus Bryan addresses what it's like to...
itunes:summary:
Actor and comedian Bryan Callen of 'The Hangover' and 'MADtv' joins the show to talk about creating his own content in standup versus working in Hollywood, and what it was like working with director Todd Phillips -- plus Bryan addresses what it's like to go through cancel culture.

 

See Bryan Callen live in Austin, Texas at the Cap City Comedy Club July 28th, 29th, and 30th!
